events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The system detected keywords related to refund in the customer's report and categorized the case appropriately.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to assist with the refund request for the incorrect product delivered.
Hello, this is Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 887766 and here is a photo showing that the item I got is different from what was advertised.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and assistance with this refund issue.
The refund process has been initiated and we consider the case resolved. Please let us know if you need anything else.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your help and excellent customer support.
We are closing this support case as the refund issue has been successfully resolved to your satisfaction.
We have sent you a short customer satisfaction survey to gather feedback about your experience with our support.
